title: "Accomodations"

### Conference Costs

Attendance at the conference sessions is **free of charge**. Coffee and light refreshments will be provided during breaks throughout the conference days.

Attendees are responsible for booking and paying for their own accommodation and meals. Trondheim offers a wide variety of lodging and dining options to suit different preferences and budgets.

### Accommodation Suggestions

Here are a few options ranging from luxury to budget-friendly. Many hotels are located in the city center, offering convenient access to the venue via public transport or walking.

* **[Britannia Hotel](https://britannia.no/en){target="_blank"}:**
    A historic, 5-star hotel in the city center known for its elegance, spa, and
    Michelin-starred restaurant, Speilsalen.
* **[Radisson Blu Royal Garden Hotel](https://www.radissonhotels.com/en-us/hotels/radisson-blu-trondheim-royal-garden){target="_blank"}:**
    Located centrally, often popular for events.
* **[Scandic Nidelven](https://www.scandichotels.com/hotels/norway/trondheim/scandic-nidelven){target="_blank"}:**
    Contemporary hotel by the river, known for its award-winning breakfast.
    Close to the Solsiden area.
* **[Thon Hotel Nidaros](https://www.thonhotels.com/our-hotels/norway/trondheim/thon-hotel-nidaros/){target="_blank"}:**
    Stylish hotel in a historic building near the train station.
* **[Scandic Bakklandet](https://www.scandichotels.com/hotels/norway/trondheim/scandic-bakklandet){target="_blank"}:**
    Situated in the charming Bakklandet district.
* **[Thon Hotel Trondheim](https://www.thonhotels.com/our-hotels/norway/trondheim/thon-hotel-trondheim/){target="_blank"}:**
    Centrally located option.
* **[Scandic Solsiden](https://www.scandichotels.com/hotels/norway/trondheim/scandic-solsiden){target="_blank"}:**
    Located in the popular Solsiden district with many restaurants and shops
    nearby.
* **[Scandic Lerkendal](https://www.scandichotels.com/hotels/norway/trondheim/scandic-lerkendal){target="_blank"}:**
    Large, modern hotel connected to Lerkendal stadium, a bit further from the
    absolute center but well-connected.

For a more comprehensive list including B&Bs and other options, please check
[Visit Trondheim's Accommodation page](https://visittrondheim.no/en/accommodation/){target="_blank"}.

### Dining Suggestions

Trondheim is celebrated as a European Region of Gastronomy and "Home of Nordic Flavours". You'll find a diverse range of dining options:

**Restaurants:**

*   **[Fagn](https://fagn.no/en/){target="_blank"}:** Celebrated
    Michelin-starred restaurant offering modern, refined Nordic cuisine across
    two concepts: a fine dining restaurant upstairs and a more casual
    bistro/bar downstairs. Known for its creative dishes and warm atmosphere.
*   **[To Rom og Kjøkken](https://toromogkjokken.no/en/){target="_blank"}:**
    A classic and popular bistro known for its high-quality European dishes
    prepared with Norwegian ingredients. Great atmosphere.
*   **[Bula Neobistro](https://www.bulaneobistro.no/){target="_blank"}:** Offers an
    innovative and playful tasting menu experience with creative flavor
    combinations and presentation. Known for its fun vibe.
*   **[Baklandet Skydsstation](https://www.skydsstation.no/){target="_blank"}:**
    A charming and historic cafe/restaurant in the picturesque Bakklandet
    district, serving traditional Norwegian dishes, cakes, and cocoa in a
    cozy setting.
*   **[Kalas & Canasta](https://www.kalasogcanasta.no/){target="_blank"}:**
    A popular bistro located by the Nidelva river, known for its seasonal menu,
    good wine list, and lively atmosphere, especially in summer.

**Bars & Pubs:**

*   **[Trondhjem Mikrobryggeri](https://www.tmb.no/){target="_blank"}:** A local
    microbrewery and pub offering a wide selection of their own craft beers
    alongside hearty pub food in a rustic setting.
*   **[Antikvariatet Musikkkafé og Bar](https://antikvariatet.no/){target="_blank"}:**
    A unique spot combining a bookstore, cafe, and pub by the river. Features
    live music, a good beer selection, and a cozy, bohemian atmosphere.
*   **[ØX Tap Room](https://oxtaproom.no/){target="_blank"}:** The taproom for the
    local ØX brewery, serving a wide range of their own craft beers, often
    including experimental batches. Popular among beer enthusiasts.
*   **[Raus Bar](https://www.rausbar.no/){target="_blank"}:** A stylish cocktail bar
    known for its skilled bartenders, creative and classic cocktails, and
    intimate, sophisticated atmosphere.
*   **[Kieglekroa](https://www.kieglekroa.no/){target="_blank"}:** Claiming to be
    Trondheim's oldest pub, this cellar bar offers a traditional pub
    experience with a selection of beers and a historic ambiance.

**Cafés & Breakfast:**

*   **[Scandic Nidelven Breakfast](https://www.scandichotels.com/hotels/norway/trondheim/scandic-nidelven/restaurant-bar/restaurant){target="_blank"}:**
    While part of a hotel, its breakfast buffet is nationally famous and
    award-winning, open to non-guests (booking usually required). Offers an
    immense variety.
*   **[Dromedar Kaffebar](https://dromedar.no/){target="_blank"}:** A popular local
    coffee shop chain with several locations. Known for excellent coffee,
    skilled baristas, and good baked goods.
*   **[Hevd Håndverksbakeri](https://hevd.no/){target="_blank"}:** An artisan bakery
    focused on sourdough bread and high-quality pastries, buns, and
    sandwiches. Great for a quick breakfast or lunch.
*   **[Jacobsen & Svart](https://jacobsensvart.no/){target="_blank"}:** A specialty
    coffee roaster and cafe dedicated to high-quality, ethically sourced
    coffee. Ideal for coffee purists.
*   **[SellandBakk](https://www.sellanraa.com/){target="_blank"}:** Located in
    Bakklandet (associated with Sellanraa Bok & Bar), this cozy cafe is
    renowned for its delicious homemade cakes, pastries, and light lunch
    options in a charming setting.
